title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 3, 2019
description: Today we feature the birthday of etiquette expert Emily Post (1873) and the poem “Rush Hour” by Anita Pulier.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we feature the birthday of etiquette expert Emily Post (1873) and the poem “Rush Hour” by Anita Pulier.
